divs: Sighting Details1 WHITE LIGHT ABOUT 5 FEET OFF THE GROUND HOVERED OUTSIDE POLE BARN WINDOW THEN WENT TO THE TOP OF BUILDING AND HOVERED IN FRONT OF THE COOPALA CAME BACK DOWN BACK TO THE WINDOW THEN IT WENT TO THE BACK OF THE BUILDING. SNUCK UP ON IT IN THE BACK OF THE BUILDING AND IT HAD TURNED INTO ABOUT 7 LIGHTS ABOUT 8 FEET AWAY FROM ME. I SAID WHAT THE, IT HEARD ME GOT MUCH BRIGHTER THEN SHOT OFF INTO THE WOODS.
Summary: UPON THE 7 OR 8 LIGHTS SEEING ME THEY GOT MUCH BRIGHTER THEN SHOT OFF INTO THE WOODS IT CAME BACK AGAIN BUT WHEN IT SAW THE CAMERA IT TOOK OFF AGAIN LOWEST ALTITUDE WAS ABOUT 5 FEET
